focusedAbilities.desc:
At the start of each turn, you may target 1 non-Unique token held by someone within range of you or your Copies, then choose one or both:
Steal the chosen token; -and/or-
Convert the chosen token into an Iron token.
focusedAbilities.trigger: at the start of each turn

fusedAbilities.desc:
At the start of each allied turn, you may target 1 non-Unique token held by someone within range of you or your Copies, then choose one or both:
Steal the chosen token; -and/or-
Convert the chosen token into an Iron token.
fusedAbilities.trigger: at the start of each allied turn

franticAbilities.desc:
Until your next turn, at the start of each turn, you may target 1 non-Unique token held by someone within range of you or your Copies, then choose one or both:
Steal the chosen token; -and/or-
Convert the chosen token into an Iron token.
franticAbilities.trigger: at the start of each turn

actions.name: Bag of Tricks
actions.desc:
Bag of Tricks can be used as either a Dice Action or a Token Action.
To pay for Bag of Tricks, choose one or more: Spend a 2+ and 1 HP; -or- Spend a 3+; -or- spend 2 Iron tokens; -or- spend 3 Speed tokens; -or- pay 3 HP.
X is equal to the number of costs paid. Choose X: Create a Copy within range and swap spaces with it; -or- Create a Pit Trap in an empty space within range; -or- Move up to 2, then swap spaces with an obstacle within range; -or- Pull 3 to an enemy you can see and they discard 1 token; -or- Give 2 Weakness tokens to an enemy within range.
Usable once per turn.

alphaSuper.name: Funny Little Box Of Pain
alphaSuper.desc: Target an enemy at Range 2. Push everyone adjacent to the target one space. Then, place Walls into each space adjacent to the target, place a Deadly Trap beneath them, and give them 5 Fatigue tokens.

deltaSuper.name: Steal Strength
deltaSuper.desc: Target an adjacent character. They discard all tokens they hold, and you gain Iron tokens equal to the number of tokens discarded.
